sqldiff.help:
USE: The diffs are ordered by data model version number. The script can be run in a top down fashion and is expected to not fail or overwrite old data
EXPECT: - "use business-database-name;" was called prior to calling this script

diff.author: Md. Khaiurl Islam
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cs_doc_profile` ( `doc_pro_id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `doctor_name` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `designation` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `course` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `session` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `created_date` DATETIME DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`doc_pro_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

diff.author: Md. Khairul Islam
